panels.description: API uptime
panels.title: UPTIME

panels.description: Usuários logados no último minuto
panels.title: USERS LOGGED [1m]

panels.title: JDBC POOL

panels.description: Estado das conexões com o database
panels.title: CONNECTION STATE

panels.description: Hora da inicialização da API
panels.title: START TIME

panels.description: Erros de autenticação no último minuto
panels.title: AUTH ERRORS [1m]

panels.description: Conexões com o database em timeout
panels.title: DB CONNECTION TIMEOUT [1m]

panels.description: Warnings e erros logados nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: WARN & ERROR LOG [5m]

panels.description: Memória heap utilizada

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})* 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})

panels.title: HEAP USED

panels.description: Porcentagem de utilização de CPU
panels.title: CPU UTILIZATION %

panels.description: Informações sobre os estados das Threads existentes.
panels.title: Thread States [1m]

panels.description: Memória non-heap utilizada

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})* 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})

panels.title: NON-HEAP USED

panels.description: Média de uso de CPU
panels.title: CPU AVERAGE [1m]

panels.description: Total de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS [1m]

panels.description: Número de erros 500 no último minuto
panels.title: ERROR 5XX [1m]

panels.description: Latência média por minuto
panels.title: LATENCY PERCENTILES

panels.description: Exibe os 10 endpoints que mais retornam erro 500.
panels.title: TOP 10 ERROR 5xx ENDPOINTS

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status=~"5..", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job",  status=~"4..", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

panels.title: ERROR RATE [5m]

panels.description: Tempo de resposta da API no último minuto
panels.title: RESPONSE TIME [1m]

panels.description: Os 10 endpoints mais lentos da aplicação.
panels.title: TOP SLOWEST ENDPOINTS (PERCENTILE)

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT [1m]

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200"}[1m])

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION [1m]

panels.description: Duração máxima de uma requisição
panels.title: MAX REQUEST DURATION
